response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $10,000. This price not only reflects the high quality and utility of the product but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a competitive advantage compared to our standard pricing. I trust this offer will be beneficial for both of us. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
